service_name: HPE Managed Desktop Service including device with Exchange for 50,000 Users
company_name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Services UK Limited
page_content:
Hewlett Packard Enterprise Services UK Limited

HPE Managed Desktop Service including device with Exchange for 50,000 Users

HPE Workplace Services delivers a subscription-based service for UK Public Sector desktop hardware and software. HPE assumes responsibility for provisioning, deployment and support of your user estate, simplifying your financial management by minimising capital investment and removing asset maintenance issues.

Features

  • Secure virtualisation options available at Official and Official-Sensitive classifications
  • Provides anywhere, anytime access across a variety of device types
  • Opex Per-user as-a-service pricing model
  • Integrates cleanly with existing and future user services
  • Increased application and data security
  • Windows, Android and iOS supported
  • Rapid provisioning of applications and desktops
  • Automated process of delivering or updating applications
  • Assist to securely enable the use of BYOD models

Benefits

  • Migration to future mode of operation in months not quarters
  • Minimal downtime for end user
  • Reduced operating costs by providing user profile tailored services
  • Extend existing user hardware end of life by 1-3 years
  • Configurable solution to meet requirements of different user profiles
  • Increased data security over current end-user environment
  • Add Speed and agility in service transformation
  • Quickly accommodates workforce changes by enabling rapid provisioning and de-provisioning
  • Increased audio and video capabilities
  • Improved employee productivity and satisfaction

Pricing

£20.15 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available
